meanings.definition: The skill or quality of work done by a worker or craftsperson.
meanings.sent1: The beautiful workmanship of the handmade table impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The artist's workmanship on the sculpture was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy robot tried to mimic human workmanship but failed comically.
meanings.sent4: Her workmanship in the kitchen was like a symphony of flavors.
meanings.sent5: The intricate workmanship of the watchmaker was evident in every tiny gear.

meanings.definition: The art or skill of a worker or craftsperson.
meanings.sent1: The delicate workmanship of the embroidery was admired by all.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter's workmanship on the wooden chair was flawless.
meanings.sent3: The magician's workmanship in pulling off the trick left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: His workmanship in storytelling was like painting with words.
meanings.sent5: The jeweler's workmanship on the ring was exquisite and detailed.
